mapper.update: UPDATE sport_analysis SET left_average = #{left_average}, right_average = #{right_average}, left_result = #{left_result}, right_result = #{right_result}, left_result_1 = #{left_result_1}, left_result_2 = #{left_result_2}, left_result_3 = #{left_result_3}, left_result_4 = #{left_result_4}, right_result_1 = #{right_result_1}, right_result_2 = #{right_result_2}, right_result_3 = #{right_result_3}, right_result_4 = #{right_result_4} WHERE sportman_id = #{sportman_id};
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(l.total) from leftinsole l,bind_insole b WHERE l.leftid=b.left_id AND b.sportman_id=#{sportman_id} AND b.bind=1
SELECT AVG(r.total) from rightinsole r,bind_insole b WHERE r.rightid=b.right_id AND b.sportman_id=#{sportman_id} AND b.bind=1

SELECT (CASE WHEN max_sum = sum_right_1 THEN '1' WHEN max_sum = sum_right_2 THEN '2' WHEN max_sum = sum_right_3 THEN '3' WHEN max_sum = sum_right_4 THEN '4' END) AS remark FROM (SELECT rightid, SUM(average_1) AS sum_right_1, SUM(average_2) AS sum_right_2, SUM(average_3) AS sum_right_3, SUM(average_4) AS sum_right_4, greatest(SUM(average_1) ,SUM(average_2) ,SUM(average_3) ,SUM(average_4)) AS max_sum FROM rightinsole GROUP BY rightid) rightinsole INNER JOIN bind_insole b ON rightinsole.rightid = b.right_id WHERE b.sportman_id = #{sportman_id} AND b.bind = 1;

SELECT (CASE WHEN max_sum = sum_left_1 THEN '1' WHEN max_sum = sum_left_2 THEN '2' WHEN max_sum = sum_left_3 THEN '3' WHEN max_sum = sum_left_4 THEN '4' END) AS remark FROM (SELECT leftid, SUM(average_1) AS sum_left_1, SUM(average_2) AS sum_left_2, SUM(average_3) AS sum_left_3, SUM(average_4) AS sum_left_4, greatest(SUM(average_1) ,SUM(average_2) ,SUM(average_3) ,SUM(average_4)) AS max_sum FROM leftinsole GROUP BY leftid) leftinsole INNER JOIN bind_insole b ON leftinsole.leftid = b.left_id WHERE b.sportman_id = #{sportman_id} AND b.bind = 1;

SELECT AVG(average_1) AS left_result_1,AVG(average_2) AS left_result_2,AVG(average_3) AS left_result_3,AVG(average_4) AS left_result_4 FROM leftinsole INNER JOIN bind_insole on leftinsole.leftid=bind_insole.left_id where bind_insole.sportman_id=#{sportman_id} GROUP BY leftid

SELECT AVG(average_1) AS right_result_1,AVG(average_2) AS right_result_2,AVG(average_3) AS right_result_3,AVG(average_4) AS right_result_4 FROM rightinsole INNER JOIN bind_insole on rightinsole.rightid=bind_insole.right_id where bind_insole.sportman_id=#{sportman_id} GROUP BY rightid
